mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_role_menu(role_id,menu_id,status) SELECT #{roleId},menu_id,0 FROM sys_menu
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sm.perms FROM sys_menu sm INNER JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON sm.menu_id = rm.menu_id AND rm.status = 1 INNER JOIN sys_user_role sr ON sr.role_id = rm.role_id WHERE sr.user_id = #{userId} AND sm.perms IS NOT NULL
SELECT sr.role_sign FROM sys_role sr INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON sr.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId}
